nl.uva.se.imppipes.test

Class Test

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.uva.se.imppipes.test.Test

  • public class Test
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for testing nl.uva.se.imppipes using PlusOneFilter and TimesTwoFilter.
    Author:
    FT_7

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAXIMUM_TEST_VALUE
      A maximum to the values processed while testing.
      static int NUMBER_OF_TESTS
      The number of tests performed.
      static int NUMBER_OF_VALUES_PER_TEST
      The number of values processed per test.

      Constructor and Description
      Test()
      Constructor for Objects of class Test.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> calculateResult() 
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> generateRandomIntegerList() 
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Run NUMBER_OF_TESTS tests.
      boolean runTest()
      Start the startFilter of this Test, wait for the filtering to finish using the method described in the documentation of StartFilter.run(), reset the filters, get the result and check whether it is equal to the list of testValues used by this Test after adding one to each element and then multiplying it by two, ignoring the order of the elements.
      static boolean test()
      Created a new Test and use it to run a test by calling runTest().

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • NUMBER_OF_TESTS

        public static final int NUMBER_OF_TESTS
        The number of tests performed. Ten by default.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NUMBER_OF_VALUES_PER_TEST

        public static final int NUMBER_OF_VALUES_PER_TEST
        The number of values processed per test. Ten by default.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAXIMUM_TEST_VALUE

        public static final int MAXIMUM_TEST_VALUE
        A maximum to the values processed while testing. Then by default.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Test

        public Test()
        Constructor for Objects of class Test. Creates a chain of a StartFilter, a PlusOneFilter, a TimesTwoFilter and a FinalFilterScaler, all expecting and returning Integers for processing.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Run NUMBER_OF_TESTS tests. Test progress and results are printed to System.out.
        Parameters:
        args - a list of command line parameters, which are ignored

      • test

        public static boolean test()
        Created a new Test and use it to run a test by calling runTest(). Any occuring Exceptions are printed to System.out.
        Returns:
        whether or not the performed test succeeded

      • runTest

        public boolean runTest()
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Start the startFilter of this Test, wait for the filtering to finish using the method described in the documentation of StartFilter.run(), reset the filters, get the result and check whether it is equal to the list of testValues used by this Test after adding one to each element and then multiplying it by two, ignoring the order of the elements.
        Returns:
        whether or not the filters produced the same result as a call to calculateResult()
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if calling wait() on the monitor used by this Test throws an InterruptedException

      • calculateResult

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> calculateResult()
        Returns:
        the result of adding one to each element of the testValues used by this Test and then multiplying it by two.

      • generateRandomIntegerList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> generateRandomIntegerList()
        Returns:
        a List of NUMBER_OF_VALUES_PER_TEST Integers between 0 and MAXIMUM_TEST_VALUE
